author: chaserxy
content: thanks Ryan, that's useful! so an already-synced archive node generates negligible IOPS. during the initial sync though I guess it's much higher. do you think SATA speeds are realistic in syncing an archive node from scratch?

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Depends on what kind of time frame you're willing to wait, definitely the more IOPS the better but both are going to be somewhat slow-going.
